Commands Intro

The more you knowâ€¦

  • Prefix for all commands is ?.
  • Both commands and arguments are case-insensitive.
  • Multiple arguments are separated with commas.
  • Invalid user input will be silently ignored in most cases.
  • <argument>=required [argument]=optional |=or

For examples click a command below.

Command Alias Arguments Permission
anto a <word> user
dict d <word> user
enigma e none user
help h none user
leet eleet none user
music m <method>, <query> user
qrcode qr <text> user
quote q none user
rhyme r <word> user
syno s <word> user
sys none none admin
tcmd none <command> admin
time t <zone1>[, [zone2], [zone3], ...] user
